data.name: 友邦保險(新加坡)
data.desc: 友邦新加坡（AIA Singapore）是友邦保險集團的全資子公司，友邦保險是亞洲領先的人壽保險集團之壹。在新加坡，友邦提供壹系列人壽保險、健康保險和儲蓄計劃，致力於幫助客戶規劃健康和財富的未來。公司以其全面的保險解決方案、卓越的客戶服務和強大的財務實力而聞名。友邦新加坡不斷創新，通過數字化服務和個性化產品，滿足客戶多變的需求。作為新加坡保險市場的領導者，友邦通過其廣泛的代理網絡和服務中心，為客戶提供便捷和專業的服務體驗。

files.fileName: 友邦新加坡 - 企業概覽.pdf
files.author: BEEFINTECH-CENTRE

products.productName: Early Critical Protector Waiver Of Premium II
Early Critical Protector Waiver Of Premium (Rider)

products.desc: 友邦優智創富繫列(友邦優智創富及友邦優智創富(II)) 能為您分擔重負，而且只憑這一項計劃就可幫助您達成所願。在這項計劃下，您的儲蓄將以自動操作為模式，讓您在增大儲蓄的同時，享有隨時提取資金的靈活性，以實現您在人生旅途中的任何目標。
友邦優智創富繫列(友邦優智創富及友邦優智創富(II)) 能為您分擔重負，而且只憑這一項計劃就可幫助您達成所願。在這項計劃下，您的儲蓄將以自動操作為模式，讓您在增大儲蓄的同時，享有隨時提取資金的靈活性，以實現您在人生旅途中的任何目標。
妳可能身體健康，但由於事故和突發衛生事件很難預測，做好准備是值得的。即使妳目前的住院計劃包括住院費用，額外的費用也會很快增加——特別是如果妳需要請假來集中精力恢復。每天只需0.90新元，友邦保險醫院收入就可以彌補您的住院計劃，讓您放心，知道您和您的家人在您康復期間將得到照顧。
友邦保險智能靈活獎賞計劃(II)專為現代進取人士而設，讓妳根據自己的儲蓄目標制定理財計劃。妳可以選擇妳喜歡的付款方式和保險期限，妳可以輕鬆地生活，我們會照顧妳的後顧之憂。最好的是，妳還可以靈活地選擇提取每年的保證優惠券來犒賞自己，或者積纍它們來實現妳的長期目標。
透過友邦保險靈活理財，我們會定期預留固定金額，助您節省開支。透過一繫列保費繳付期及承保範圍選擇，您可以享受靈活的選擇，同時積纍一筆財富，為您的未來鋪平道路。
在友邦保險，我們理解這些情緒，友邦保險白金財富遺產旨在為您提供理想的平衡。它是財富積纍和保證家庭長期安全的結合，而不管基金的錶現如何。
為您介紹AIA Pro終身保障(II)，這是一項您可根據個人喜好定制的保障及財富積纍計劃。

products.productName: AIA Platinum Gift For Life Series
products.desc: AIA鉑金終身禮品繫列(AIA鉑金終身禮品(II)及AIA鉑金終身禮品Plus)專為您、您的子女及您的孫輩三代人而設計。
友邦保險白金退休精英計劃是一項以新元和美元為主的投資連結計劃，專註於為您的退休年創造最大的財富。它是獨特的制作和擴展的靈活性，以適應您不斷變化的需求。憑借世界級資產管理公司的專業知識和可持續的長期財富戰略，我們將幫助您實現理想的退休生活。
透過AIA Pro achievever 2.0，您可以從第一天起就將100%的保費投入，開啟您的投資旅程。我們甚至會為您提供有吸引力的歡迎獎金，以增加您的初始資本，併為您未來的投資提供特別獎金，只要您繼續為該計劃捐款
為妳的退休夢想繪制完美的路線比妳想象的要容易。與其尋找合適的退休計劃，不如選擇友邦保險退休儲蓄計劃(IV)，為值得夢想的退休生活探索無限可能。所以現在就開始吧——不需要體檢，再簡單不過了

You’ve worked hard to get where you are today. Don’t let an accident erode your assets and upset the lifestyle you’ve become accustomed to. AIA Platinum AccidentCare provides the protection you need to maintain your lifestyle in the event of a mishap. Created with high-net-worth individuals in mind, you’ll receive optimal worldwide coverage that offers high payouts when accidents happen, so you can continue enjoying the lifestyle you have built.

AIA Star Protector Plus is a personal accident insurance plan for kids that offers affordable worldwide accident and health cover for your child. It provides protection against accidental injuries and burns, as well as coverage for 16 common diseases, giving them the confidence to explore life to the fullest.

With AIA Solitaire PA (II), you can get covered for more than just personal accidents. Enjoy 24/7 worldwide coverage for medical, dengue fever, TCM and chiropractic treatment costs, food poisoning, transport accidents, building fires, kitchen misadventures, and a whole lot more. All for as little as S$0.60 a day, with no medical check-up required.

products.productName: AIA Healthshield Gold Max Standard Plan
products.desc: 我們可以依賴終身健保滿足住院的需求。然而，當發生不測事故時，您可能需要更全面的醫療保健方案以獲得更大的保障，併需將自行承擔的醫藥費維持在最低水平。
我們可以依賴終身健保滿足住院的需求。然而，當發生不測事故時，您可能需要更全面的醫療保健方案以獲得更大的保障，併需將自行承擔的醫藥費維持在最低水平。
生活充滿了激動人心的機會和新發現，但也可能有無法預料的挑戰。做好准備可以幫助減少嚴重疾病等問題的影響。AIA生命之光是一個危重疾病計劃，專門迎合女性的需求。它涵蓋了一繫列的疾病，包括那些特別影響女性的疾病，所以妳可以掌控妳的健康和財務狀況，以確保妳的生活容光煥發。

AIA Absolute Critical Cover is a forward-looking critical illness plan that takes your protection further in the future. It is also the first and only plan in the market offering potential cash value.Be safeguarded from not just critical illnesses at different stages, but also chronic, age-related, and future unknown diseases. We’ve got you covered in sickness and in good health!

AIA MultiStage Critical Protector is a simple and affordable way to supplement your protection against 6 common critical illnesses. Now you can live life to the fullest, knowing that you will be financially safeguarded with a one-time 100% payout as you head towards recovery.

AIA Platinum Wealth Heritage is a Single Premium USD whole life plan that protects everything you’ve worked for, while growing your wealth through stable returns. But it doesn’t stop there, it also makes a promise to you that your legacy will be handed down seamlessly according to your wishes.

We created AIA Diabetes Care, a groundbreaking plan for pre-diabetics and Type 2 diabetics aged 30 to 65 years old. The plan provides coverage for key diabetes-related conditions, ensuring you have the financial support you need in case the unexpected occurs. Through AIA Vitality, you will also be rewarded for each healthy choice you make, motivating you to live a healthier lifestyle in the long run.

Getting insurance coverage in later years can be difficult, with expensive premiums and numerous medical checkups required. AIA Prime Critical Cover is designed to provide adults aged 40 to 70 with easy access to affordable and comprehensive critical illness coverage when they need it most.

AIA Beyond Critical Care offers premium refund on top of protection against major stage critical illnesses (CIs) and relapse as well as mental illnesses. It also comes with optional add-ons that offer more coverage for 104 early, intermediate, and major CIs, and waiver of future premiums in the event of CI.

AIA Platinum Generations (II) is a US$ limited pay whole life plan that offers lifelong protection, regular additional income and long-term growth potential for your money. It protects, preserves, and grows the wealth you’ve accumulated today, giving it the potential to benefit up to three generations.

AIA MultiStage Cancer Cover is a cancer insurance policy that provides 20 years of coverage during the crucial income-earning years of one’s life. With affordable premiums that will not go up with time, the plan offers 100% cancer insurance coverage of up to S$250,000 for early, intermediate or major stage cancer.

AIA Guaranteed Protect Plus (III) is designed as a single solution that offers wider coverage for your protection needs. With its unique multiplier feature, it gives you the ability to boost your coverage by up to 5 times while ensuring affordability. This plan also provides stable cash value that is accumulated over time.

Suddenly finding yourself unable to work due to a disability can have a devastating effect on your family’s financial security. It can very quickly become a struggle to pay bills, meet education expenses and mortgage payments. With AIA Premier Disability Cover, an ongoing income provides vital financial stability and peace of mind while you adapt to your new situation.

products.productName: AIA Platinum Gift for Life II
products.desc: You have spent years building a life of success for yourself, and passing on that wealth has always been an integral part of your financial planning. But we believe that you too deserve to enjoy that success in the way you most desire. AIA Platinum Gift for Life (II) is specifically designed to supplement the lives of all three generations – for you, your child, and your grandchild.
AIA Secure Flexi Term is designed to do just that. It offers high coverage at affordable premiums along with a wide range of protection options to suit your needs.

With AIA Platinum Wealth Elite, we offer a first-in-market, bespoke wealth solution that protects and accelerates your wealth like no other. Through active portfolio management by world-class asset managers, you can enjoy more freedom to focus on the things you love.

You have worked hard to reach the pinnacle of success, and your life’s achievements deserve protection. With AIA Platinum Legacy (IX), you can ensure your legacy lives on for generations to come. AIA Platinum Legacy (IX) is uniquely designed to help enhance your financial assets and transfer your estate in accordance to your wishes. By passing on your accumulated wealth, you can empower your children to build on your success and provide an even better living for future generations.
「友邦百樂財富永傳」著重財富增值，讓您在需要時提取累積財富，並將資產分配給摯愛。憑借保單分拆、更變受保人及第二受保人等選項，您便能靈活安排資產傳承，惠澤世世代代。

You’ve worked hard to get where you are today. Don’t let an accident erode your assets and upset the lifestyle you’ve become accustomed to. AIA Platinum AccidentCare provides the protection you need to maintain your lifestyle in the event of a mishap. Created with high-net-worth individuals in mind, you’ll receive optimal worldwide coverage that offers high payouts when accidents happen, so you can continue enjoying the lifestyle you have built.
為了確保更好的退休生活，五分之二的新加坡人將更多資金用於投資+。然而，我們理解，在您積極增加財富的當兒，也會擔憂虧損資金、手頭現金不足、通貨膨脹導致的資金貶值等問題。憑借友邦菁英恆定金生 (AIA Elite Secure Income)，您大可拋開煩惱，專註於增長您的財富。
